input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Grizzly C2125 Shaper Cutter with Double Lock Miter and 3/4-Inch Bore

Item specifications:
Grizzly 3/4-Inch bore shaper cutters feature top-quality c-2 carbide--the best available for wood cutting applications shaped and sharpened with dam
Double Lock Miter
Cutting length: 1-Inch
Can be used on wood, composites, plywood, and some plastics at 5,000 to 10,000 rpm

Product description:
input_text.Response A: With the Grizzly C2125 Shaper Cutter with Double Lock Miter, you can create a variety of intricate designs on your woodworking projects. This cutter features a c-2 carbide blade that provides superior cutting performance on wood, composites, plywood, and some plastics. It has a 1-inch cutting length and can be used on shapers with a 3/4-inch bore. The double lock miter design ensures that the cutter stays secure during use, and it can be used at speeds between 5,000 to 10,000 rpm. The Grizzly C2125 is a high-quality shaper cutter that will add versatility and creativity to your woodworking projects.
input_text.Response B: This cutter is the one you've been looking for. With the top-quality c-2 carbide 3/4-inch bore shaper cutter, double lock miter, and 1-inch cutting length, it can be used on wood, composites, plywood, and even some plastics. It has a speed of 5,000 to 10,000 rpm.
